text: remember when Kia was all about cheap
generic economy cars well today it's
design team is led by Audi and Cadillac
alumni and two of its most popular
vehicles are family sized the third
generation Sorento can take the clan to
out-of-the-way places built on the same
platform as the Sedona minivan it's easy
to confuse the names Sedona is the
minivan Sorento here the crossover the
one that everyone wants to buy because
nobody wants to buy a minivan for some
reason vans are more useful but even the
most practical shoppers will be wooed by
Sorrento's handsome lines strong but
elegant neighbors will think it's a
luxury brand until they get close enough
to see this front drive Sorrento's start
at twenty five thousand eight hundred
dollars this all-wheel drive SX limited
model with all option packages is forty
five one a significant price jump it
buys luxury gear such as a heated wheel
radar assisted cruise control and vented
front chairs with hide that's baby
bottom smooth there are three engines a
naturally aspirated four-cylinder a v6
and the one that I'm driving it's a
2-liter turbocharged four-cylinder
there's 240 horsepower and 260 pound
feet of torque
the gearbox has six cogs it always seems
to be in the right one this mid-level
engine feels punchy enough off the line
zero to sixty spools up in about eight
seconds significantly more refined than
the outgoing model kia took much of the
numbness out of the steering and the
weight is adjustable its luxury car
quiet Sorrento's ride quality is very
comfortable a little bit of body roll
not too bad the size feels just right
sound like Goldilocks it slots in
between a CRV and Highlander so there's
room for the family but you'll never
feel like a bus driver the back pillar
cuts into visibility drinking standard
grade gasoline this drivetrain is
government rated at nineteen city twenty
five highway smack dab in the middle of
the other two engines I'm seeing 19
miles per gallon in mixed driving
equipped with all-wheel drive sorento
will venture into places that quite
frankly most owners will never go for
daily commutes involving boulders and
deep water by a jeep grand cherokee this
is what owners stare at most often good
to see kia gave it the same spendy
appearance as the exterior if this looks
German to you you're not alone and
around view camera system can be had the
v6 model can cross 47 grand which might
seem out of line for Kia but add up all
the luxury touches including an
excellent iPad like interface and the
price begins to make sense considering
all of Sorrento's features I'm a little
surprised that the fairly roomy backseat
does not slide fore-and-aft to max out
either legroom or cargo room the floor
is flat and there's generous foot room
if you can't charge your phone here it
means you forgot a cord there's
everything needed in this limited model
to keep three adults from complaining
including heated seats for the outboard
positions with the proximity key in
pocket or purse all you have to do is
stand close to the tailgate for three or
four seconds and it opens automatically
sorento is available with an optional
third-row this one does not
haven't in its place there's enough
storage to keep the kids sports gear out
of sight and the cargo space is pretty
generous
if TP is your thing know that Sorento
can haul 14 bundles of it
vehicles are so well done these days
it's rare to find one that stands out in
its segment Sorento does it with style
comfort and features though those at the
price kia is no longer about bargain
basement pricing sorento may not be
inexpensive but its value sure looks
good
